Native32Bit & operator= (const BigEndian32Bit &v)

Detailed Description

Native32Bit defines a 32 bit unsigned integer value in format of the native target architecture (little or big endian)

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Native32Bit::Native32Bit (  UINT32  v = 0  )  [inline]
 

Constructs a native integer from a native value

Native32Bit::Native32Bit (  const BigEndian32Bit &  v  )  [inline]
 

Constructs a native integer from a big endian value. If native architecture uses big endian, the conversion expands to a null statement

Native32Bit::Native32Bit (  const LittleEndian32Bit &  v  )  [inline]
 

Constructs a native number from a little endian value. If native architecture uses little endian, the conversion expands to a null statement

Member Function Documentation

Native32Bit & Native32Bit::operator= (  const LittleEndian32Bit &  v  )  [inline]
 

Assigns little endian number to native number

Native32Bit & Native32Bit::operator= (  const BigEndian32Bit &  v  )  [inline]
 

Assigns big endian number to native number

Reimplemented from LittleEndian32Bit.
